one_reviews_text: Imagine all the tedium of going to a gun range and none of the fun.   Let me spend 20 minutes figuring out how to load magazines and gather crap from the cabinets instead of actually shooting the targets.

Basically, this is a simple no-frills Gun Target range sim. All weapons are available (no progression system for getting weapons). Weapon selection is a bit limited (basically just one of each type, pistol, rifle, assault rifle, etc.). Controls are decent (reloading weapons is pretty forgiving) however my biggest problem with this game is the totally un-intuitive movement system. The horribly implemented Teleportation system is counter intuitive and frustratingly annoying.  Free locomotion would have been preferable, or at least a more straightforward teleportation system.
